New Records: India won the T20 World Cup for the second time
This is India's first T20 World Cup win since 2007
Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 14 runs
Suryakumar Yadav took a clutch catch to dismiss David Miller
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli announced their retirement from T20 internationals after the match
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's performance
Virat Kohli said it was a 'now or never' situation and this was his last T20 game for India
Aiden Markram said it was 'gut-wrenching' to lose the final
Miscellaneous Highlights: India beat South Africa by 7 runs in the final
The match was a thrilling contest with both teams showing great skill and determination
The crowd was electric and the atmosphere was tense throughout the match
